Title: Creates an electronic arraignment pilot program for the Colonie town court; repealer
Summary: Creates an electronic arraignment pilot program for the Colonie town court.
LawCode: Rpld & add Art 185 ยง185.10, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to creating an electronic arraignment pilot program and to repeal article 185 of the criminal procedure law relating thereto; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
